title.rendered: Meet Our Team at the iFX EXPO International in Cyprus

content.rendered:
The Financial Commission, a leading external dispute resolution (EDR) organization catering to the financial services industry, announces its participation in the upcoming IFX EXPO International conference, taking place on September 19-22, 2023 in Limassol, Cyprus. Valued broker members and interested parties are invited to join Commission representatives to discuss The Financial Commission’s external dispute resolution services for online brokers.

This premier event, renowned for connecting top-level executives from international firms, promises a platform for networking, business growth, and a wealth of insightful content.

BOOK A MEETING

Financial Commission representatives will be ready to showcase the organization’s membership and certification options, as well as value-added services from companies such as YourBourse, FinWizard, and Broker Pilot. Attendees will also be able to get insights into The Financial Commission’s operating metrics and find out how its external dispute resolution service helps thousands of traders in various ways each year.

Financial Commission Chief Operating Officer, Nikolai Isayev said: “We are glad to be attending the IFX EXPO International, as the event has been successful for us in the past and brings together the most important industry leaders and innovative companies from the European region.”

The organization joins a list of more than 100 confirmed exhibitors and representatives from hundreds of financial services providers including retail brokers, fintech providers, prime brokers, and payment technology leaders expected to attend the exclusive industry gathering.

About The Financial Commission

The Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) forum for consumers/traders who cannot resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers who are members of The Financial Commission. The Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise during trading electronic markets such as Foreign Exchange. Then, it expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.
